title: PreWork Study Guide
description: This was my very first dip into coding, a simple study guide for the prework of the bootcamp I attended. It was created using HTML and CSS.

title: EconoMe
description: My Final Project of Bootcamp, a wonderfully dynamic budgeting app created using React

title: Original Portfolio
description: The first iteration of my portfolio as I was learning. I love to see how far I have come!

title: StaffSync
description: I remember this being a fun backend assignment that I blasted through. Should have realized then how well I was picking up database CRUD functions.

title: eNotes
description: Another early bootcamp assignment, this time working on the backend with an RESTful API.

title: Mongoose Mind Map
description: As I said, I seem to enjoy the backend, here is where I began getting into MongoDB!

title: TTRPG-Inventory-Bot BotOfHolding
description: This project was a group project that I was part of, it was a really fun idea and I learned a lot about working with others in a coding environment. I also learned a lot about the Discord API. Building the bot was fun but I also learned about trying to keep a project organized and on track with a group. There was some major hurdles with the authentication and routing that prevented deployment. Some of us will be re-doing this together with our more developed skills as a passion project.

title: GeneratingSteamHeat
description: This is a README Generator that I created as a homework assignment. I was so proud of it, I used it to create the README for this portfolio!

title: Forecaster
description: This one I actually struggled a lot with. I learned a lot about APIs and how to use them.
